sourcesContent:
import "./AboutUsStyles.css"; function AboutUs() { return (

Our Vision

Dedicate ourselves to focused training in the field of Travel, Tourism & Hospitality; prepare aspiring students in achieving their goals by providing them with holistic guidance, backed by our national and international affiliations; be a mentor and an institution that sets parameters by giving impetus to talent and partners the growth of the travel and tourism industry.To develop a globally competitive, environmentally sustainable and socially responsible tourism industry that promotes inclusive growth through employment generation and equitable distribution of income thereby contributing to building a foundation for a high trusted society.

Our Mission

We strive to provide an affordable and distinctive learning experience in a caring environment that will help students in setting their goals and achieving them.We strive to be consistent with our vision. Our primary distinction is high quality content delivery and our philosophy to prepare our students in a way that guarantees ready employment.To develop a globally competitive, environmentally sustainable and socially responsible tourism industry that promotes inclusive growth through employment generation and equitable distribution of income thereby contributing to building a foundation for a high trusted society.

); } export default AboutUs;
